name: RhiemUserProducts

infos.name: Kundenspezifische Produkte
infos.description:
Diese App ermöglicht es, einer Gruppe von Kunden nur bestimmte Produkte im Shop anzuzeigen. Die Gruppen der App kannst du selbst erstellen und konfigurieren und sind dabei unabhängig der zugeordneten Kundengruppen die Shopware zur Verfügung stellt. Du hast somit die Möglichkeit individuellen Gruppen von Kunden nur eine bestimmte Auswahl von Produkten anzuzeigen oder ausgewählte Produkte zu verbergen.


Dokumentation

Shopware 6 Kundenspezifische Produkte (rhiem-intermedia.de)

Lizenzbestimmungen

Bitte beachte unsere Lizenzbestimmungen:https://rhiem-intermedia.de/lizenzbestimmungen

Mit der Benutzung unserer App bestätigst du, dass du die Lizenzbestimmungen gelesen hast und damit einverstanden bist.

Fragen zur App?

Gerne unterstützen wir dich bei der Installation oder weiteren Fragen zur Verwendung der App.
Bitte nutze dafür die Shopware-App-Support Funktion in deinem Shopware-Account.

Individuelle Appentwicklung?

Als Shopware Solution-Partner mit langjähriger Erfahrung stehen wir dir gerne mit Rat und Tat zur Seite.

Schreibe uns eine Email: shopware@rhiem.com oder
rufe uns an: +49 (0) 28 55 – 97 00 55

Weitere Informationen über uns findest du auf unserer Shopware-Partnerseite:
https://de.shopware.com/RHIEM-Intermedia-GmbH/
infos.installationManual:
Installiere die App in der Administration über den Reiter:

|-- Administration

    └ Erweiterungen

        └Meine Erweiterungen

            └Erweiterung hochladen
infos.shortDescription: Einzelnen oder einer Gruppe von Kunden werden nur ausgewählte Produkte angezeigt. Steuere ganz genau, welche Produkte ein Kunde sehen kann. Ideal für eine individuelle Präsentation.
infos.highlights:
Individuelle Gruppierung von Kunden
Massenzuweisung von Kunden
infos.features:
Volle Kontrolle über das Produktportfolio je Kunde
Konfiguration unabhängig von der Shopware Kundengruppe
Intuitive Bedienung über Administrations-Modul
kompatibel mit verschiedenen Verkaufskanälen
Ausblenden leerer Kategorien, wenn diese durch Produktgruppen keine Produkte mehr enthält
Sichtbarkeit der Artikel durch "Whitelist" oder "Blacklist" steuerbar

infos.name: User-specific products
infos.description:
This plugin allows a group of customers to display only certain products in the shop. The groups of the plugin can be created and configured by yourself and are independent of the assigned customer groups that Shopware provides. You have the possibility to show only a certain selection of products to individual groups of customers or to hide selected products.


Documentation

Shopware 6 User specific products (rhiem-intermedia.de)


License Agreement

Please note our license agreement: https://rhiem-intermedia.de/license-agreement

By using our plugin you confirm that you have read the license agreement and agree with it.


Questions about the plugin?

We are happy to support you with the installation or further questions regarding the use of the plugin. 
Please use the Shopware plugin support function in your Shopware account.


Individual plugin development?

As a Shopware Solution Partner with many years of experience, we are happy to help you with words and deeds.

Write us an email: shopware@rhiem.com or
give us a call: +49 (0) 28 55 - 97 00 55

For more information about us, please visit our Shopware partner page:
https://en.shopware.com/RHIEM-Intermedia-GmbH/
infos.installationManual:
Install the plugin in the administration via the tab:

|-- Administration

    └ Extensions

        └My extensions

            └ Upload extensions
infos.shortDescription: Only selected products are displayed to an individual or group of customers. Control exactly which products a customer can see. Ideal for an individual presentation.
infos.highlights:
Individual grouping of customers
Mass allocation of customers
infos.features:
Full control over the article portfolio per customer
Configuration independent from the Shopware customer group
Intuitive operation via backend module
Compatible with different sales channels
Empty categories can be hidden if they are emptied via a product group
Visibility of the articles controllable by "Whitelist" or "Blacklist"

comments.text: Das Plugin leistet genau das, was es soll. Auch bei vielen PL-Artikeln, die nur einzelnen Kunden angezeigt werden dürfen, ist das Einstellen simpel. Der Support ist schnell und hilft sehr lösungsorientiert.
comments.headline: Absolut zu empfehlen!

changelog.text: Bugfix: If you put a product in the shopping cart as a user who is not logged in and then logged in with a user who was not allowed to see & buy the product according to the configuration, the product was not removed from the shopping cart.
Compatibility with Shopware 6.5

• Bugfix: product groups that were limited to certain categories could lead to errors on the product detail page
  • Bugfix: inactive product groups were still partly taken into account
• Bugfix: Items could be added via shopping cart
• Bugfix: Structure elements and links were hidden when empty categories should be hidden
• Bugfix: Error when selecting mode "Whitelist Plus"

• Bugfix: Hiding of categories did not work with the combination Blacklist + Whitelist Plus
  • Feature: Assignment of customer groups possible
  • Feature: Restriction to certain categories possible

• Feature: Performance on product detail pages optimised
  • Bugfix: If assigned products were subsequently converted into variant products, the assignment no longer worked.
• Compatibility with Shopware > 6.4.15.0
• Fixed incorrect type hinting that caused incompatibilities with other plugins

• Fixed problem with hiding empty categories
  • Rebuild of the Javascript files for Shopware 6.4.10
• Bugfix: Error in variant selection for "Whitelist Plus" product groups
Bugfix: Product group cannot be created if Active is not selected

- Addition of a new group mode "Whitelist Plus", this allows to extend the fallback group to make more specific settings to product groups

- Removed the ability to deactivate or delete the fallback group

Improved performance in shops with many variant products

Bugfix - Fixed an error when assigning a product stream without products to a category.
• Bugfix: Listing is not cached per product group

• Feature: Variant capability
  • Bugfix: plugin incompatibilities
• Bugfix: CrossSellings are not taken into account
• Bugfix with product slider in 6.4.1

• Compatibility with Shopware 6.4
  • Customers and products can be added with a click on the name

• Bugfix: customers can't be filtered in the modal for assigning customers to product groups
  • Bugfix: product slider and CMS elements are not taken into account

• Performance improvement of the "Hide empty categories" function
  • Performance improvement of the assignment of customers and products to a product group in administration
  • Product groups are now taken into account by the cache

• Search does not show all products in the product group
  • Save mass allocation does not stop loading

Bugfix:
  • Fixed Key Constraint

Bugfixes:
  • A problem with loading the Customer Extension was fixed
  • An error when saving the customer assignment to a product group in the administration has been fixed
• Bugfix: Categories in the Offcanvas menu partially hidden, when they should be shown
• Bugfix: Fallback product group is not overwritten, if already existing

• Bugfix: Error, if no categories are selected in the Config, which should not be hidden
  • Categories that do not have products assigned to them are not hidden
  • Product stream categories are considered

• Feature: Configuration for categories that should not be hidden
  • Bugfix: Fixed bug when updating extended entities
• Shopware 6.3 compatibility
• Initial plugin release
